summary: A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.
cast: James Ellison|Frances Dee|Tom Conway|Edith Barrett|James Bell|Christine Gordon|Theresa Harris|Sir Lancelot|Darby Jones|Jeni Le Gon|Richard Abrams|Doris Ake|Rita Christiani|Vivian Dandridge|Alan Edmiston|Kathleen Hartsfield|Norman Mayes|Jieno Moxzer|Clinton Rosemond|Arthur Walker|Martin Wilkins|Melvin Williams
title: Yo anduve con un zombie
